welcome_message_body: Welcome to Uruapan, Mexico! Known as the "avocado capital of the world," our charming city is filled with lush greenery, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Uruapan has to offer.

restaurants.name: Taquería "Carlitos"
restaurants.description: Taquería "Carlitos" is a taco restaurant located in Uruapan.
restaurants.address: Independencia (Aquiles Serdan), 60000 Uruapan, Michoacán de Ocampo

restaurants.name: La Marinera
restaurants.description: La Marinera is a seafood restaurant located in Uruapan.
restaurants.address: Ocampo 5 (Emilio Carranza), Uruapan, Michoacán de Ocampo

restaurants.name: Mercado De "Antojitos"
restaurants.description: Mercado De "Antojitos" is a restaurant located in Uruapan.

restaurants.name: Las Camelinas
restaurants.description: Las Camelinas is a mexican restaurant located in Uruapan.
restaurants.address: El Hotel Plaza, Uruapan, Michoacán de Ocampo

restaurants.name: Uno Cocina De Barrio
restaurants.description: Uno Cocina De Barrio is a gastropub located in Uruapan.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Uruapan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Uruapan Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
